Questions Model¶

Overview¶

Usage¶

class questions.models.AbstractQuestion(*args, **kwargs)¶

An abstract question model specifying the question text to display and the display order of the question.

class questions.models.Option(*args, **kwargs)¶

Stores a single option to included as a choice for a questions.OptionQuestion.

class questions.models.OptionQuestion(*args, **kwargs)¶

A question type that accepts a selection from a list of choices (multiple choice).

class questions.models.OptionQuestionResponse(*args, **kwargs)¶

OptionQuestionResponse(id, created, modified, user_id, question_id, response_id)

class questions.models.TextQuestion(*args, **kwargs)¶

A question type that accepts text input.

class questions.models.TextQuestionResponse(*args, **kwargs)¶

:template:`questions/base.html`
